## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                  | Type     | Default |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `selectedIndex` | `selected-index` | Configures the tab/panels to select by default upon loading. | `number` | `0`     |
